Reviews.Title: Great value, great phone.
Reviews.Author: Ragin S.
Reviews.Content: I am impressed with the quality of this used phone! It looked almost brand new and the price was great. We had missed the time frame for a claim through the phone insurance. It was a blessing to find it and for less than our deductible!

Reviews.Title: Great Condition and fast shipping
Reviews.Author: shagadelic98
Reviews.Content: The item was exactly as described and worked like a charm. Got it a day or two early and worked great.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Case
Reviews.Content: The phone worked great, no problems right out of the box. I would not hesitate to purchase from them again.

Reviews.Title: The worst smart phone I have ever encountered
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Selden
Reviews.Content: Bought it because it was cheap, I have encountered nothing but problems upon using this phone.  The keyboard crashes multiple times a day and it just freezes constantly.  I literally can't even use it an am frantically scrambling to buy another phone on the cheap because I can't deal with too much more of this.  By far the worst piece of technology I have ever owned.  The battery life is miserable so I bought the extended battery which is massive.  Sometimes it calls random people and then when I touch the screen to hit "end" it turns the screen off.  If I remove my finger the screen then turns back on.  The only way to remedy this is to take out the battery, restart the phone, and apologize to the person I accidentally called.  Avoid at all costs, I can't even believe that this thing costs money it is so unbelievably awful.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone no lag
Reviews.Author: B.McClure
Reviews.Content: I got this phone as a freebie from Verizon. I upgraded from the LG Vortex (which I LOVED for 2 years.) I ONLY us LG phones because #1 I have never had a problem with one #2 all my chargers/accessories are for LG and I can't see buying all new stuff for another brand. Phone runs GREAT. I have had zero problems with any connection or lag with this device. The ONLY problem that I have encountered with this phone is that i cannot figure out how to save downloaded apps/games (angry birds, weather app, solitaire, pinterest, etc.) to my microsd card. I have searched and searched and there is no option on where to save these apps. It has 8gigs of storage on the phone, so it's not a problem.........I just prefer to save everything to the sd card. Other than that, it is an awesome phone. You definately need a heavy duty case because the phone is very thin.....but i'm rough on phones, so that might not affect anyone else.

Reviews.Title: I'm lovin' it!
Reviews.Author: Cody Amador
Reviews.Content: I love this phone! It won't break no matter how much I slam it around! I'm even thinking of purchasing another for when this one dies in a few years.

Reviews.Title: Great replacement phone if...
Reviews.Author: Daze9900
Reviews.Content: This phone has potential if you're willing to get your hands dirty a little bit. The reason why I say this is that the phone as stock comes with Android 2.3.6 which is basically useless in today's world. A lot of the popular apps are not fully supported by Android versions 4.0 or less. If you're willing to root and modify the phone you can get cyanogenmod 10.1 on it updating to 4.1.2 which gives you Android 4.1.2 jelly bean. What's great about that is that you get more control over your phone by modifying the CPU governor allowing for better battery life, better application compatibility and best of all, Google Now integration. I honestly cannot use an Android phone without google now. The voice control to set events, reminders, alarms get voice response from google search is so vital. I would recommend this phone if you are willing to root.

Reviews.Title: a good phone
Reviews.Author: Patricia L. Brenner "tax accountant"
Reviews.Content: Have had few problems with this phone in 18 months.  Speaker for out going  calls not working properly but I think it is because I dropped it.  Looking for a reasonably priced replacement.

Reviews.Title: Expensive paperweight.
Reviews.Author: CoCo
Reviews.Content: After receiving the package, I promptly put everything together and plugged the phone up. I left it on charge until it was completely full, all the while being turned off. After I unplugged it and plugged it back in (because this was the only way I check the progress of the charging) and determined it to be full, I unplugged it and attempted to turn it on. Nothing happened. I tried several times, holding the power button at variable lengths of time, but still the phone would not turn on. Despite the aggravation, I am also disappointed. I love LG phones, but this one just comes up lacking.

Reviews.Title: Meh
Reviews.Author: Tyler Womack
Reviews.Content: This phone was a display phone. It had advertisements for verizon that wouldn't stop without a lot of tinkering. Meh.

Reviews.Title: Brand new...? I dnt think so... BS!
Reviews.Author: britney mccord
Reviews.Content: The back of the phone wldnt stay on. luckily i had a lucid b4 and used the back off it. Says it was. new and it was scuffed on screen and back plate.

Reviews.Title: Why was there a handwritten post it note?  There was no manual or paperwork with this device and it's supposed to be new.
Reviews.Author: Candice Abrams
Reviews.Content: We received the phone with a handwritten post it note.  We still can't get the device synced with the internet, which is why we purchased a smart phone to begin with.  I was under the impression this was a new device or I would not have ordered it.  I'm very unhappy with it.

Reviews.Title: PrePay Phone
Reviews.Author: Graylen Jones
Reviews.Content: This is a prepay phone that will take 6 month to put on Verizons network. Will not work as a contract phone for 6 months.

Reviews.Title: wrong product
Reviews.Author: Colt
Reviews.Content: This phone did not come as a 4G or Verizon phone. bought it as a cheap replacement for a couple months until I drop Verizon. when I received this phone, there was no slot for my SIM card so I took it to the Verizon store. when the person at Verizon tried to activate it, it was not unlocked to verizons service/network. it also was a 3G phone. I also didn't like that the power button was at the top of the right side and is a tiny circular button unlike almost all phones. do not waste your money on this Korean garbage.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Rarebreed79
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my son as I didn't want to pay an arm and leg for a phone and it worked great. Had it for a while it just froze up recently to where the touchscreen doesn't work anymore which is a bummer because I was going to give it to my nephew but hey it was a used phone guess it was it's time to croak.

Reviews.Title: thank you
Reviews.Author: Erica Perry
Reviews.Content: thank you! i love my replacement phone...my old  phones screen cracked.  the delivery was fast!  i'll keep you in mind for further purchases

Reviews.Title: can't beat it for the price
Reviews.Author: lee
Reviews.Content: phone was in great shape and was impressed with how well it worked for $50 used phone. if you need a temporary phone until your contract ends or you don't want to have a contract or spend a lot than this is a good choice

Reviews.Title: Worst piece of technology
Reviews.Author: emily carpenter
Reviews.Content: This is an awful phone. I chose it because it had cool features and all it does is glitches. I've even gone through two because of these problems. It breaks very easy because cheap plastic, screen is the only thing constructed well with gorilla glass. The keyboard always stops working. The lock screen always freezes. It always fails to send pictures. It is the most awful thing I have ever used in my life and I've been stuck with it for a year and a half

Reviews.Title: lg lucid
Reviews.Author: ROSE PORTER
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone as a replacement for my fourteen year old daughter to have until she can upgrade to the one she really wants. She has been very happy with it so far.

Reviews.Title: First Smart Phone
Reviews.Author: FairyFire
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for almost a year now, and once I got use to it I loved it. It is the first smart phone I have had so I have nothing to compare it with. It was easy to use and I love that I can down load music direct from windows media player. I haven't had any problems with it.  I only wish I could unlock it, so I could take it with me when I leave Verizon.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Jacob Barker
Reviews.Content: The phone works great, and if i ever need to buy another phone, I will buy it from GottaGetaPhone.com , because of the quality and cheapness.

Reviews.Title: new phone purchase
Reviews.Author: vida
Reviews.Content: The phone did not come with SD card. But otherwise was a new phone and looked ok and arrived on time.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste money!
Reviews.Author: deidra
Reviews.Content: The back of the phone does not fit...PERIOD! It came without a SIM, but the seller does not let you know that you need one

Reviews.Title: Phone for my Goat
Reviews.Author: Brandon
Reviews.Content: Better than described no scratches, clean, smells ok.....rooms were clean,  staff seemed very nice, free buffet and internet works fine.

Reviews.Title: I liked this phone a lot until it shorted out my $1600 Macbook Pro
Reviews.Author: Sam Myer
Reviews.Content: I owned this phone for 4 months and enjoyed using it up until two days ago, when it shorted out my Macbook Pro.  The charger began to not properly charge the phone, so I tried a few different outlets and then my USB slot in my laptop.  The moment the charger entered the USB slot, the laptop shorted out.  I troubleshooted with it and it determined it needed hardware repairs.  I've submitted a complaint to LG and will leave this one star review up until they compensate me for damages to my Macbook Pro.  I will not trust another LG product again, unless they make this right.

ProductInfo.Features: LG VS840 LUCID 4G VERIZON LTE ANDROID 4.0
ProductInfo.Name: LG Lucid 4G VS840 Verizon CDMA Android Cell Phone - Black
